entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023
